galaxy.io
Class GalaxyOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--galaxy.io.GalaxyOutputStream
public class GalaxyOutputStream
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods for writing data to a Galaxy Communicator connection.
